name: Extraction 404
description:
Aim of the game:
Help guide the robots around the factory before their batteries run out and without any of them becoming 'scrap' from the hazards around the level.

How To Play:
Use the buttons at the bottom of the screen to select what controls you want to place. You are only able to place '5' controls before starting the game. Once started you are free to place and remove as many as you want.

Notes:
Play in full screen.
There is no set method to complete the level, you must find your own solution. Good Luck!

Solution:
